name: Gun out of control
description:
Controls:

WASD   - Movement
Arrow Keys - Gun direction
Escape   - Quit

You have to survive as many waves as possible.

You have a gun which can turn in many weapons but it also has a small problem. You can not control which gun you currently use and you can not choose when you shoot.

For this reason you have to do your best with the current selection and act fast when you get notified about the next weapon.

Known Issues:

Overlapping enemies

Enemies stuck after getting hit (of course intented for freeze gun)

Credits:

Sounds - https://opengameart.org/content/gunloop-8bit

                    https://opengameart.org/content/3-melee-sounds
